org.corfudb.infrastructure.management

Class ClusterStateContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.infrastructure.management.ClusterStateContext

  • public class ClusterStateContext
extends Object
    Cluster State Context maintains shared context composing of cluster connectivity. Created by zlokhandwala on 11/2/18.

    • Constructor Summary

      ClusterStateContext()

    • Method Detail

      • incrementHeartbeat

        public void incrementHeartbeat()
        Increment local heartbeat counter.

      • getClusterState

        public ClusterState getClusterState()
        Fetches the latest snapshot of the cluster state.
        Returns:
        Returns an immutable copy of the cluster state.

      • updateNodeState

        public void updateNodeState(@NonNull
                            ClusterState clusterState,
                            @NonNull
                            Layout currentLayout)
        Updates the cluster view based on another cluster view received in the heartbeat response. The latest Node states from this cluster state are retained and the stale ones are discarded.
        Parameters:
        clusterState - Cluster state to update the local copy of the cluster state with.

      • refreshClusterView

        public void refreshClusterView(@NonNull
                               String localEndpoint,
                               @NonNull
                               Layout snapshotLayout)
        Refreshes the cluster view based on the local endpoint and the snapshot epoch at which the node states are updated.
        Parameters:
        localEndpoint - Local Endpoint whose node state entry is to be updated in the cluster view map.
        snapshotLayout - Snapshot layout.

      • logClusterView

        public void logClusterView()
        Print the clusterView for debugging.

      • updateResponsiveNodes

        public void updateResponsiveNodes(@NonNull
                                  Set<String> responsiveNodesState)
        Updates the set of responsive nodes received from the healing detector.
        Parameters:
        responsiveNodesState - Set of responsive nodes.

      • updateUnresponsiveNodes

        public void updateUnresponsiveNodes(@NonNull
                                    Set<String> unresponsiveNodesState)
        Updates the set of unresponsive nodes received from the failure detector.
        Parameters:
        unresponsiveNodesState - Set of responsive nodes.

      • updateLocalServerMetrics

        public void updateLocalServerMetrics(@NonNull
                                     SequencerMetrics localSequencerMetrics)
        Updates the local server metrics.
        Parameters:
        localSequencerMetrics - local server metrics to be updated.
